title: Gather last 18 months of pay stubs
description: You'll need these to document your income history for both EDD and Hartford. Digital copies are fine.
warnings: FedEx pay stubs don't clearly distinguish sick pay from regular pay
tips: Download from Workday before your access changes
Save as PDF with dates in filename

title: Calculate your highest quarterly income
description: CA SDI benefits are based on your highest quarter of earnings in your base period.
tips: Use the calculator tool to help with this

title: Document your sick bank balance
description: Know your current sick time and DSA bank balances. This affects when you'll need SDI and LTD.
tips: Check Workday for current balances
Note accrual rates

title: Get your doctor's information ready
description: Collect your treating physician's full name, license number, phone, fax, and address.
warnings: EDD takes 7-10 business days to verify doctor licenses
tips: Verify the license is current at mbc.ca.gov

title: Save your W-2 forms
description: Keep copies of recent W-2 forms showing CA SDI taxes withheld.
tips: Available in Workday under Tax Documents

title: Determine your claim effective date
description: This is typically your last day worked, but can be complicated for pilots.
warnings: EDD uses calendar months; FedEx uses last day worked
If you didn't fly in a month, EDD may consider disability starting on the 1st

title: Choose filing method: Online, Mail, or In-Person
description: Decide how you'll file based on your situation and location.
warnings: Mail can add weeks to processing time
tips: Online is fastest if you can navigate the portal
In-person gives immediate confirmation

title: Complete the SDI claim application
description: Fill out the DE 2501 form (online or paper) with your disability information.
warnings: Form must be submitted within 49 days of disability start
tips: Have all documents ready before starting
Save progress if filing online

title: Have your doctor complete medical certification
description: Your doctor must complete their portion of the claim form.
warnings: Doctor's license must be verifiable by EDD
tips: Bring the doctor certification template to your appointment

title: Submit claim with all documentation
description: Submit your completed claim with all supporting documents.
warnings: Keep copies of everything you submit
tips: If mailing, use certified mail with return receipt

title: Record your claim confirmation number
description: Save your EDD claim confirmation number and any reference numbers.
tips: Write it in multiple places
Take a screenshot if online

title: Set up EDD Online account
description: Create an account on edd.ca.gov to track your claim status online.
tips: Use a reliable email address
Save your login credentials securely

title: Monitor mail and email for EDD requests
description: EDD may request additional documentation. Respond promptly to avoid delays.
warnings: EDD often requests documents already submitted
tips: Keep copies of everything you've already sent

title: Follow up if no response within 21 days
description: If you haven't heard anything, call EDD or check your online account.
warnings: Hold times can be very long
tips: Call early in the morning
Have your claim number ready

title: File initial LTD claim with The Hartford
description: If your disability extends beyond sick bank, file for Long-Term Disability.
warnings: Hartford will ask about CA SDI status
tips: Have your FedEx employee ID ready

title: Understand the offset calculation
description: Learn how Hartford calculates and applies the CA SDI offset to your LTD payments.
warnings: Offset applies whether or not you've received SDI payment
tips: Document all communication with Hartford

title: Track your Hartford appeal deadline
description: Mark the 6-month deadline from offset decision for potential appeal.
warnings: Missing this deadline forfeits your appeal rights
tips: Set multiple calendar reminders
Deadline is 180 days from decision

title: Consider PBRB process through ALPA
description: If disputing Hartford's decision, consider the Pilot Benefit Review Board process.
tips: Contact ALPA R&I committee for guidance

title: Identify nearest EDD office
description: Find the EDD office location and hours nearest to you.
tips: Check the contacts page for office locations

title: Plan arrival time (before 9:00 AM)
description: EDD offices use ticket systems. Arrive early to get a ticket.
warnings: Some offices run out of tickets
tips: Arrive before doors open
Bring something to do while waiting

title: Prepare all documents to bring
description: Gather all required documents before your EDD office visit.
tips: Use the document checklist in the guide
